summary: In-depth documentary about the history of the Hellboy comic book, the history of the character and the making of the 2004 movie adaptation of the same name.
cast: Nick Allder|Shadi Almassizadeh|Velvy Appleton|Kevin Baillie|Mauricio Baiocchi|Xavi Bastida|Selma Blair|Steve Boeddeker|Blair Clark|Guillermo del Toro|Mike Elizalde|TyRuben Ellingson|Colin Epstein|Rupert Evans|Jake Garber|David 'Rudy' Grossman|Jimmy Hart|John Hurt|Edward Irastorza|Sven Jensen|Doug Jones|Todd Labonte|Lloyd Levin|David Martí|Jim McVay|Mike Mignola|Guillermo Navarro|Wendy Partridge|Ron Perlman|Montse Ribé|Mike Richardson|Matt Rose|Stuart Scott|Mark Setrakian|Monty L. Simons|William Todd Stinson|Jeffrey Tambor|Paul G. Thuriot|Ryan Tudhope|Chad Waters
title: 'Hellboy': The Seeds of Creation
